snippet.title: Guacamelee! 2 - Shirtless Arachnid Person Costume
snippet.description:
New Shirtless Arachnid Person skin with Portillo chicken form AVAILABLE NOW for free within Guacamelee! 2 by entering the following code in the costume menu:  down, down, up, up, right, left, right, left, up, left

Available Now for PS4 and Steam (no additional purchase required) and coming soon to Nintendo Switch and Xbox One!
